sentences.en: A heavy-handed approach from the police could undo that good impression.
sentences.cn: 警方采取高压手段可能会毁掉之前留下的好印象。

sentences.en: Doctors can get the wrong impression from even an accurate description.
sentences.cn: 即便很精确的病历也可能让医生产生错误的印象。

sentences.en: He gave an impression of the minister which made us all laugh.
sentences.cn: 他模仿那位部长令我们大家发笑.

sentences.en: He had managed to create the entirely spurious impression that the company was thriving.
sentences.cn: 他设法制造出一种彻头彻尾的假象，让人误以为公司一派兴旺。

sentences.en: he was under the impression that they had become friends.
sentences.cn: 他依稀觉得他们已经是朋友了。

sentences.en: Her words left a lasting impression on me.
sentences.cn: 她的话给我留下了难忘的印象。

sentences.en: His speech made a strong impression on the audience.
sentences.cn: 他的演说给听众留下了深刻的印象.

sentences.en: I got the impression she'd like a word with you, sir.
sentences.cn: 我觉得她可能想和你谈一谈，先生。

sentences.en: I got the impression that she wasn’t very happy with her job.
sentences.cn: 我有这样的印象，她的工作干得并不愉快。

sentences.en: I had the distinct impression that I was being followed.
sentences.cn: 我清楚地感觉到有人跟踪我.

sentences.en: It made a very forceful impression on me.
sentences.cn: 它给我留下了深刻的印象。

sentences.en: She made a favourable impression on his parents.
sentences.cn: 她给他的父母留下了好印象。

sentences.en: She says the artist's impression is an excellent likeness of her abductor.
sentences.cn: 她说这张模拟画像像极了绑架她的人。

sentences.en: Some of the fallen trees had left a clear impression in the hardened mud.
sentences.cn: 有一些倒下的树木在坚硬的泥地上留下了清晰的压痕。

sentences.en: The experience made an indelible impression on me.
sentences.cn: 那次经历使我难以忘怀。

sentences.en: The general impression at the studio was that he was able.
sentences.cn: 在这个画室获得的总的印象是他很有才能.

sentences.en: The impression is so deep that it can hardly ever blow over.
sentences.cn: 印象太深了,忘也忘不了.

sentences.en: The new striker failed to make an immediate impression on the team.
sentences.cn: 新的足球前锋没能立即为球队发挥作用.

sentences.en: When we looked around the school we got a very good impression.
sentences.cn: 我们参观了学校，对它的印象很好。

words.tran_cn: 敏感的；感受性强烈的；易感动的
印象派的；印象主义的；给人深刻印象的
感人的；令人钦佩的；给人以深刻印象的
印象主义者；印象派作家
盖印；强征；传送；给予某人深刻印象
印象；效果，影响；压痕，印记；感想

phrases.tran_cn: 印象管理；印象操纵；印象整饰
长久的印象；不可磨灭的印象
让人眼前一亮；给人留下…的印象

trans.tran_cn: 印象，影响，印象画，感觉，滑稽模仿，外观，压痕，重印本
trans.tran_en: the opinion or feeling you have about someone or something because of the way they seem
